name: Shell History Per Project
description: Persist shell history per project by automatically detecting and configuring all available shells (zsh, bash, fish). Supports auto-detection or manual shell selection.

shell.description: Shell type to configure history persistence for. 'auto' detects and configures all available shells.

historyDirectory.description: Directory where shell history will be persisted

maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of history entries to keep
